edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151

Interface GhostMovementAlgorithm

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinearGhostMovementAlgorithm, NearestGhostMovementAlgorithm, RandomGhostMovementAlgorithm

    public interface GhostMovementAlgorithm
    A GhostMovementAlgorithm uses a Ghost's explored positions and other information a Ghost has to determine the next position on the map the Ghost should move towards.
